headline.main: Electronic Alarm Watch Devised; Electronic Alarm Watch Among Patents of Week

docs.abstract: Patent is granted to Uranus Electronics Inc vp Arthur F Cake and assigned to co for electronic alarm wrist watch; timepiece described; co pres Morris Levine comments; illus of Cake (S)
